header.title: Universal Standard for Cross-Chain DeFi
header.lead: Alice Dollar, Trustless Price Oracle and Cross-Chain DEX enable DeFi across different blockchains.

services.title: Features
services.service1.title: Free ALICE Tokens
services.service1.desc: Get free ALICE token every 24 hours proportional to your deposited stablecoins.
services.service2.title: Trustless Price Oracle
services.service2.desc: Operators provide price feeds for each asset. They get slashed on their previously staked ALICE tokens if are not honest.
services.service3.title: Cross-Chain DEX
services.service3.desc: With Alice Dollar as base pair, the AliceFi Protocol offers a Cross-Chain DEX where assets are traded across chains.
services.service4.title: Alice Dollar (ALD)
services.service4.desc: ALD can be swapped with DAI, USDT, TUSD, USDC, PAX, GUSD. It unifies the whole ecosystem of stablecoins on each blockchain.

features.feature1.title: Interoperability
features.feature1.desc: Assets from Bitcoin, Ethereum, EOS, Binance, Cosmos and more are transferred in and out in a decentralized way.
features.feature2.title: Cross-Chain DeFi
features.feature2.desc: Alice Dollar, Trustless Price Oracle and Cross-Chain DEX enable DeFi across different blockchains.
features.feature3.title: 3rd Party Apps
features.feature3.desc: The first working app on AliceFi is crypto savings and loan.

contentFirst.title: ALD Savings of Fixed Interest Rate
contentFirst.desc: AliceFi offers savings to help you increase your assets most effectively. Deposit ALD stablecoins and get 8% of APR every year. There's no limit to the amount of deposits and you can withdraw any amount at any time you want! (APR : Annual Percentage Rate)

contentSecond.title: Loan Backed By Collateral
contentSecond.desc: With AliceFi, you can get a loan in less than 3 seconds. First, deposit tokens as collateral which you believe whose price will increase. Then, you will get paid for your ALD stablecoins. Use your ALD and pay it back whenever you want!

contentThird.title: Exchange with Reliability
contentThird.desc: Your crypto assets are more important that anything else. Can you really trust centralized exchanges while depositing your assets? On AliceFi you don't have to trust anyone. Blockchain technology secures your assets from any threats.

subscription.title: Reservation
subscription.desc: Reserve now and get the benefit of savings of 8% ARP. ALD savings open at late May 2019.
